flixel.text.pxText.PxBitmapFont

type
class
Holds information and bitmap glpyhs for a bitmap font.

Static Methods

clearStorage() : Void

fetch(PxHandle : String) : PxBitmapFont

parameters
PxHandle Identifier of font to fetch.
returns
Stored font, or null if no font was found.
Retrieves a font previously stored.

store(PxHandle : String, PxFont : PxBitmapFont) : Void

parameters
PxHandle String identifer for the font.
PxFont Font to store.
Stores a font for global use using an identifier.

Constructor

new()
Creates a new bitmap font using specified bitmap data and letter input.

Instance Variables

numLetters(accessor,null) : Int

Returns number of letters available in this font.

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

Clears all resources used by the font.

getFontData() : String

returns
Cryptic string with font as bits.
Serializes font data to cryptic bit string.

getFontHeight() : Int

returns
Height of font in pixels.
Returns height of font in pixels.

getPreparedGlyphs(PxScale : Float, PxColor : Int, ?PxUseColorTransform : Bool) : Array<flash.display.BitmapData>

getTextWidth(PxText : String, ?PxLetterSpacing : Int, ?PxFontScale : Float) : Int

parameters
PxText String to measure.
PxLetterSpacing distance between letters
PxFontScale "size" of the font
returns
Width in pixels.
Returns the width of a certain test string.

get_numLetters() : Int

loadAngelCode(pBitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData, pXMLData : Xml) : PxBitmapFont

parameters
PxBitmapData Font image source
PxXMLData Font data in XML format
returns
This PxBitmapFont
Loads font data in AngelCode's format

loadPixelizer(PxBitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData, PxLetters : String) : PxBitmapFont

parameters
PxBitmapData Font source image
PxLetters All letters contained in this font
returns
This PxBitmapFont
Loads font data in Pixelizer's format

prepareAngelCodeBitmapData(PxBitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData, PxXMLData : Xml, PxSymbols : Array<flixel.text.pxText._PxBitmapFont.HelperSymbol>) : flash.display.BitmapData

preparePixelizerBitmapData(PxBitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData, PxRects : Array<flash.geom.Rectangle>) : flash.display.BitmapData

render(PxBitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData, PxFontData : Array<flash.display.BitmapData>, PxText : String, PxColor : UInt, PxOffsetX : Int, PxOffsetY : Int, PxLetterSpacing : Int) : Void

parameters
PxBitmapData Where to render the text.
PxText Test to render.
PxColor Color of text to render.
PxOffsetX X position of thext output.
PxOffsetY Y position of thext output.
Renders a string of text onto bitmap data using the font.

updateGlyphData(?Tiles : flixel.system.layer.TileSheetData) : Void

Updates and caches tile data for passed node object
